home.title: WORDLE
home.welcome: Come over daily to enjoy a new WORDLE each day!
home.caption: Xxx's Wordle

help.title: HOW TO PLAY
help.content:
Guess the WORDLE in 6 tries.

Each guess must be a valid 5 letter word. Hit the “Enter” button to submit.

After each guess, the color of the tils will change to show how close your guess was to the word.
help.exp1_desc: “W” is in the word and in the correct spot.
help.exp2_desc: “I” is in the word but in the wrong spot.
help.exp3_desc: “U” is not in the word but in any spot.
